original_text: the Arabah also, with the Jordan as the border, from Chinnereth as far as the Sea of the Arabah, the Salt Sea, under the slopes of Pisgah on the east.
korean_text: 또는 아라바와 요단과 그 지역이요 긴네렛에서 아라바 바다 곧 염해와 비스가 산기슭에 이르기까지의 동쪽 지역이니라

sentences.original_text: with the Jordan as the border
from Chinnereth as far as the Sea of the Arabah
under the slopes of Pisgah on the east
